alert.note: Alert for De Witt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 16 at 2:55PM CST until February 17 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER STORM TO BRING A WINTRY MIXTURE OF PRECIPITATION AND HEAVY SNOW TO PARTS OF CENTRAL ILLINOIS LATE TONIGHT AND THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 9 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...De Witt County. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 9 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on very hazardous road conditions, especially during the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to a mixture of freezing rain and sleet early Thursday morning, becoming all snow by midday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com
